name: ALLSTATE INSURANCE COMPANY, petitioner, v. Jack JIMENEZ, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated.
name_abbreviation: Allstate Ins. Co. v. Jimenez ex rel. Situated

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
ALLSTATE INSURANCE COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Jack JIMENEZ, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated.

opinions.text: Motion of Retail Litigation Center, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiaegranted. Motion of The Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiaegranted. Motion of Equal Employment Advisory Council for leave to file a brief as amicus curiaegranted. Motion of The Product Liability Advisory Council, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiaegranted. Motion of DRI-The Voice of the Defense Bar for leave to file a brief as amicus curiaegranted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

casebody.head_matter:
ALLSTATE INSURANCE COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Jack JIMENEZ, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated.
No. 14-910.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 15, 2015.
Opinion
